content:
IProcessPingCallback Interface

Definition

Provides functionality to respond to a ping request.

In this Article

[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Guid("f11dc4c9-ddd1-4566-ad53-cf6f3a28fefe")]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.InterfaceType(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComInterfaceType.InterfaceIsIUnknown)]
public interface IProcessPingCallback

Remarks

IProcessPingCallback is introduced in the .NET Framework 3.5 . For more information, see Versions and Dependencies.

Methods

Respond()

Provides a callback routine that responds to a ping request.

public void Respond ();

Remarks

Respond is introduced in the .NET Framework 3.5 . For more information, see Versions and Dependencies.
